reference_a:
@article{dora2024,
  title = {A tutorial on analyzing ecological momentary assessment data in psychological research with {{Bayesian}} (generalized) mixed-effects models},
  author = {Dora, Jonas and McCabe, Connor J. and family=Lissa, given=Caspar J., prefix=van, useprefix=true and Witkiewitz, Katie and King, Kevin M.},
  date = {2024-01-01},
  journaltitle = {Advances in Methods and Practices in Psychological Science},
  volume = {7},
  number = {1},
  pages = {25152459241235875},
  publisher = {SAGE Publications Inc},
  issn = {2515-2459},
  doi = {10.1177/25152459241235875}
}
topics: alcohol, self-control demands, intoxication, substance use
additional_comments: data from two studies; item coding based on private codebook; some items assessed daily

features.name: hour
features.coding: Hour during which EMA survey was completed (rounded down)

features.name: control_fixmood
features.coding:
Have you needed to control/fix your mood?
0 =  Not at all
100 = Very much

features.name: control_fixthought
features.coding:
Have you needed to control/fix your thoughts?
0 =  Not at all
100 = Very much

features.name: dealt_stress
features.coding:
Have you dealt with anything stressful?
0 =  Not at all
100 = Very much

features.name: felt_overwhelm
features.coding:
Have you felt overwhelmed?
0 =  Not at all
100 = Very much

features.name: alc_drinks
features.coding: How many alcoholic drinks did you have yesterday? Please remember that a drink refers to a “standard” drink size: 12 oz. beer, 8-9 oz. malt liquor, 5 oz. wine, 1.5 oz. hard liquor. (0-30 or more)

features.name: alc_intox
features.coding:
If you drank alcohol yesterday, how drunk or intoxicated did you get?
0 = Not at all
6 = Very much

features.name: alc_hangover
features.coding:
I had a hangover
0 = No
1 = Yes

features.name: alc_vomit
features.coding:
I felt nauseated or vomited
0 = No
1 = Yes

features.name: alc_blackout
features.coding:
I couldn’t remember what I did while drinking
0 = No
1 = Yes

features.name: alc_hurt
features.coding:
I hurt or injured myself by accident
0 = No
1 = Yes

features.name: alc_onset
features.coding: About what time did you begin drinking? (Corresponding to beep)
